threat: A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to conduct HTTP request smuggling attacks, or cause Tomcat to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.
A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause memory consumption, resulting in a denial of service.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass a SecurityManager protection mechanism.
